QuestData.Title: Half-Ton Holdouts
QuestData.Description: I'd say we have a dragon problem, but it seems like they're a little more interested in New Kargath than they are in our small encampment. Nevertheless, I've got top men focused on keeping the dragons at bay.$b$bOne problem that has gone unchecked, however, is the ogre camp to our southwest. A small army of combatants seems to have appeared outside of their hovel.$b$bWe can't sit and wait for them to flank us, soldier. Thin their ranks before they thin ours.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay 12 Dustbelcher Combatants. You may kill Dustbelcher Maulers or Dustbelcher Shaman.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, $r. However, I'm afraid I don't have much to give you, other than this passionate round of applause.$b$b<Terrance looks down into his bags.>$b$bOh, I do have these. Here, take your pick.
